I think a slightly older property is potentially the bulk.
So you've got Brondervour which is old and that's where Fowl is where which is over up
on Laith D up over there and then the bulk if you go out towards on the back road by us and then out
towards Lambista there's a property on the the top of the hill you wouldn't actually see it unless
you turn back up there along Lindor's Way that's got a lintel above the the fireplace with a carving
of the sun in it and I think it says in there 1643 or something like that carved into it
and I've only been there once Diane and I spent our honeymoon the first night of our
our wedding there that was our a little escape from the party.
